Table.SqlScript: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS sitemmagic (sysName TEXT,mtype TEXT,k TEXT,kitem TEXT,kfood INTEGER,kwater INTEGER)
INSERT INTO sitemmagic (sysName,mtype,k,kitem,kfood,kwater) VALUES ("一级科研楼","鸡舍","1","火鸡","0","0")
